confirmed_facts: Stellantis Korea and Hooxi Partners signed an MOU on 2025-11-27 to share carbon credit revenue with EV customers.
The program will convert customers' electric vehicle mileage into carbon credits and allow customers to redeem the credits as coupons or points at Stellantis service centers.
Hooxi Partners operates a governmentâ€‘approved 'Electric Vehicle Program and Unit Reduction Project' that certifies GHG reductions from EV adoption and trades the resulting carbon credits.
The detailed system and implementation plan are scheduled to be developed by 2026.

timeline.event: MOU signed between Stellantis Korea and Hooxi Partners.
Stellantis Korea announced the MOU and the upcoming customer benefit program.
Development and rollout of the carbon credit revenue sharing system.
